verses.name: John 5:43
verses.text: I am come in my Father’s name, and ye receive me not: if another shall come in his own name, him ye will receive.

verses.name: John 5:44
verses.text: How can ye believe, which receive honour one of another, and seek not the honour that cometh from God only?

verses.name: John 5:45
verses.text: Do not think that I will accuse you to the Father: there is one that accuseth you, even Moses, in whom ye trust.

verses.name: John 5:46
verses.text: For had ye believed Moses, ye would have believed me: for he wrote of me.

verses.name: John 5:47
verses.text: But if ye believe not his writings, how shall ye believe my words?
